summary: The diff modifies frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx, but the truncated content does not show the title text change from 'طيور محافظة البريمي' to 'مشروع المسح الميداني لطائر البوم بمحافظة البريمي'. Additionally, two other files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) were modified, which violates the constraint that only HomePage.tsx may be changed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Change the main page title text from 'طيور محافظة البريمي' to 'مشروع المسح الميداني لطائر البوم بمحافظة البريمي' in frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx only.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff of HomePage.tsx is truncated and does not show the title text change. The visible portion of the file does not contain either the old or new title string, so it cannot be confirmed that REQ-104 was implemented.

hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly states that only frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx may be changed. Modifying frontend-file-summaries.txt was not requested.
The build request explicitly states that only frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx may be changed. Modifying project_state.json was not requested and is not permitted.
